title: Quickbooks Accountant
job_overview:
Hiring: QuickBooks Accountant for U.S.-Based Remodeling & Handyman Company (Work from Home)

We’re a growing remodeling and handyman company based in the United States looking for a highly experienced QuickBooks Accountant to join our remote team. This is a part-time role with long-term potential.

What You’ll Be Doing:

* Maintain our books using QuickBooks Online
* Reconcile bank accounts, credit cards, and track job costs
* Generate monthly Profit & Loss Statements, Balance Sheets, and Cash Flow Reports
* Track expenses, subcontractor payments, and project profitability
* Align project data from our CRM with QuickBooks records
* Ensure clean, audit-ready financials every month

Requirements:

* 3+ years QuickBooks Online experience
* Must have worked with a U.S.-based client in the home service industry (roofing, plumbing, remodeling, etc.)
* Must be available to work during U.S. Central Standard Time (CST) hours
* Strong understanding of job costing and service-based accounting
* Excellent English communication skills (spoken & written)
* Must have a dedicated home office, webcam, and noise-canceling headset
* Reliable high-speed internet
* Very detail-oriented and organized

Job Details:

* Pay: 250 - $500 USD month (part-time to full-time)
* Schedule: Must be available during U.S. CST business hours for meetings.
* Location: Remote (Philippines-based)
* Long-term position with a supportive U.S. team

How to Apply:

1. Send your updated resume
2. Record a 1–2 minute Loom video introducing yourself and explaining your QuickBooks experience and previous clients.
3. Email both to: Upgrade to see actual info -  Subject Line: QuickBooks Accountant - [Your Name]
